definition: honeysuckle
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
silver/silver-colored/relating to money or currency
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua

sentences.english: Objective To identify 17 species of Flos Lonicerae.
sentences.chinese: 目的鑑別17種金銀花的質量。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle can accelerate lymphocyte transformation and strengthen phagocytic function of white blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 金銀花能促進淋巴細胞轉化，增強白細胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: In my garden there are roses and two kinds of honeysuckle .
sentences.chinese: 在我的花園裏有玫瑰和兩種金銀花。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the process of extracting honeysuckle in Sanhua Bikang capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察三花鼻康膠囊中金銀花的提取工藝。

sentences.english: Who would have thought that my honeysuckle , and she did love home.
sentences.chinese: 有誰會想到，我的金銀花，她那樣戀家。

sentences.english: In fact, you may even taste honeysuckle carried by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，你甚至可以品嚐金銀花進行風。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the phenological variation of chlorogenic acid in Flos Lonicerae from different localities.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討金銀花中綠原酸隨產地和物候期的變化規律。

sentences.english: Conclusion Extracts from Flos Lonicerae can suppress influenza A virus FM1 strain actively.
sentences.chinese: 結論金銀花提取物可有效抑制甲型流感病毒FM1株。

sentences.english: You won’t soon forget the Hemingway Daiquiri or the Honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 你不會馬上就忘記海明威臺克利酒或是金銀花香。

sentences.english: I ran out to buy you some fruit and honeysuckle tablet.
sentences.chinese: 我休息了一天就跑出去給你買水果和金銀花含片。

sentences.english: Peppermint Leaf, Flos Lonicerae, Rhizoma Smilacis Glabrae, Radix Rehmanniae.
sentences.chinese: 薄荷葉，金銀花，土茯苓，生地。

sentences.english: On the other hand , studies also indicate its moderate anti-HTV activity.
sentences.chinese: 有資料表明金銀花對抗愛滋病顯中等活性。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo identify the best picking-up time and dehydrating method of Xianglei Honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定湘蕾金銀花最佳採收時間和乾燥方法。

sentences.english: Objective To research the antibacterial activity of varieties of Flos Lonicerae produced in Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討川產習用金銀花的抑菌作用。

sentences.english: She smells sweet, Yeah she does! Like honeysuckle in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 她聞起來很香甜，就是她，就像盛開的金銀花。

sentences.english: Conclusion When Flos Lonicerae was chosen as medicine, it should have many buds little flowers and no leaves.
sentences.chinese: 結論選用金銀花入藥時應選蕾多花少無葉者。

definition: plantain herb (Plantago asiatica)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
reed rhizome (used in TCM)
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
Portulaca oleracea (common purslane)
mugwort leaf (TCM)/Folium Artemisiae argyi
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
Houttuynia cordata
monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
creeping oxalis/edelweiss
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
ladybell root (Radix adenophorae)
